Title: Relates to establishing an excluded workers fund to provide payments to certain workers who are otherwise ineligible for unemployment insurance
Summary: Establishes the excluded workers fund to provide payments to workers who suffered a loss of work-related earnings or a major source of household income during a state of emergency declared by the governor and who are otherwise ineligible for unemployment insurance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to establishing the excluded workers fund to provide payments to workers who suffered a loss of work-related earnings or a major source of household income during a state of emergency declared by the governor and who are otherwise ineligible for unemployment insurance
